mapper.sql: `order`, position_id, symbol, order_type, login, digits, `type`, final_volume, done_time, state, order_price, sl, tp, expiration_time, reason, marginrate, `comment`, setup_time, fill_type

mapper.update:
update user_mt5_order_detail
position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login = #{login,jdbcType=INTEGER},
digits = #{digits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
final_volume = #{finalVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
done_time = #{doneTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sl = #{sl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
tp = #{tp,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=INTEGER},
marginrate = #{marginrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
`comment` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
setup_time = #{setupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fill_type = #{fillType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_mt5_order_detail set position_id = #{positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login = #{login,jdbcType=INTEGER}, digits = #{digits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, final_volume = #{finalVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, done_time = #{doneTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_price = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sl = #{sl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tp = #{tp,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, expiration_time = #{expirationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=INTEGER}, marginrate = #{marginrate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, `comment` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, setup_time = #{setupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fill_type = #{fillType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT umod.symbol symbol, umod.position_id positionId, umod.order `order`, umod.final_volume finalVolume, umod.type `type`,umod.order_price orderPrice,umod.done_time doneTime FROM user_mt5_order_detail umod WHERE umod.`login`= #{login} AND umod.`order` != umod.`position_id` AND umod.position_id !=0;

SELECT umod.order `order`, umod.symbol symbol, umod.type `type`, umod.order_price orderPrice, umod.final_volume finalVolume, umod.done_time doneTime FROM user_mt5_order_detail umod WHERE umod.state = 2 and login = #{login};
